data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 2, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Bruno Henrique for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 4, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Coritiba's Matheus Galdezani is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 10, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba pushes forward through Robson, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
In the minute 16, Coritiba drive forward but Jonathan is judged offside.
In Curitiba, Giorgian De Arrascaeta of Flamengo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Gabriel Barbosa fires in a strike for Flamengo.
In the minute 20, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Coritiba.
Flamengo drives forward and Gabriel Barbosa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 24, Flamengo push forward at Estadio Couto Pereira and Gerson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Coritiba defence.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Flamengo throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 26, Flamengo's Giorgian De Arrascaeta gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Giorgian De Arrascaeta.
In the minute 28, That's a fine assist from Bruno Henrique.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Coritiba.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bruno Henrique of Flamengo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 34, Rene Junior (Coritiba) gets a yellow card.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Jonathan of Coritiba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jonathan is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 39, Jonathan has recovered and rejoins the match in Curitiba.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo's Leo Pereira goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In Curitiba Flamengo attack through Everton Ribeiro. The finish is off target, however.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Flamengo's area.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Flamengo.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Flamengo.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Jonathan (Coritiba) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Curitiba.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Curitiba.
Leo Pereira returns to the field for Flamengo after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Flamengo.
The match at Estadio Couto Pereira has been interrupted briefly for a check on Leo Pereira, who is down injured.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Coritiba are coming forward and Rhodolfo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Coritiba's Matheus Galdezani breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Curitiba.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Coritiba.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 54, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gabriel Barbosa.
Flamengo’s Gabriel Barbosa is on his feet again at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 55, Gerson (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 56, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Flamengo throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Rene Junior has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 60, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 62, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 62, Flamengo to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
The home team have replaced Yan Sasse with Sassa. This is the first substitution made today by Eduardo Barroca.
Coritiba make their second substitution with Neilton replacing Robson.
Giorgian De Arrascaeta for Flamengo drives towards goal at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 64, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Giorgian De Arrascaeta of Flamengo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 65, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Flamengo's Gabriel Barbosa gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Flamengo's Joao Lucas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Matheus Bueno is on a sub for Igor Jesus for Coritiba.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Coritiba throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 70, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Couto Pereira, Bruno Henrique has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Pedro is replacing Bruno Henrique for the away team.
Sassa (Coritiba) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Important block from the Flamengo defence as Neilton fires in a strike for Coritiba.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 73, Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Nathan Silva (Coritiba) has received a yellow card from Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 75, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Neilton (Coritiba) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Coritiba drive upfield and Neilton gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
In the minute 76, Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
Pedro for Flamengo is whistled offside.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Gabriel Barbosa with Diego.
The home team replace Nathan Silva with Ruy.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo just outside Coritiba's area.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Ruy, who is grimacing with pain.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Ruy is back on the pitch.
In the minute 87, Diego is booked for the away team.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Coritiba.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Flamengo.
Flamengo push forward at Estadio Couto Pereira and Rodrigo Caio gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Coritiba defence.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Curitiba.
Flamengo's Pedro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Flamengo drives forward and Giorgian De Arrascaeta gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Coritiba's Ruy has been booked in Curitiba.
Rodolfo (Coritiba) gets booked by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
